attributes.action: Pay rise for Early Years Setting Staff
attributes.additional_details: £18000 pa is not enough for all the jobs that they do! Especially during this whole pandemic.
attributes.background: To give all Early Years Settings Staff a pay rise. £18,000 pa is not enough for the jobs they do!

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for the pay of staff employed at nurseries or preschools. This is a matter for individual nurseries and preschools.
